title: SQL Injection Discovery
description:
Form submissions sometimes return database errors.

Objective: Detect SQL-injection points in the portal and apply proper input sanitization.
dialogue: Mira: "I saw some weird error messages after submitting a form. Could it be SQL injection?"
Mira: "Can you test the portal for injection points and help me fix them?"
hints: Try a ' OR '1'='1 payload in form parameters.
